text: Paahi etu Nayakhobo ni Nakefa ni Nayohana, yaari phi aholhelhi olhupalhe, yahochuwelha nnema waavahiye aka ni Nlhuku, nkayaanivaha moono, miyaano ni Nabanaba, ikhalhe iphiro yo wooniha wiira niri nlhoko mmoka. Wo chiichammo, nkaneewanana wiira mii ni Nabanaba ninoorwaa uhimiachani wa attu ahiri Ayahudi ahinelhiye unyawo munrimani ni ayo arweeke wa Ayahudi, attu enelhiye munrimani.
